definitions.definition: The archaic practice of treating illness by removing some blood , believed to be tainted , from the stricken person.
The diminishment of any resource with the hope that this will lead to a positive effect.
examples: Yet another round of corporate bloodletting.

definitions.definition: A circumstance , such as a battle , where a large amount of blood is likely to be spilled through violence .

main_definition: ( historical , medicine ) The archaic practice of treating illness by removing some blood , believed to be tainted , from the stricken person.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) The diminishment of any resource with the hope that this will lead to a positive effect.
A circumstance , such as a battle , where a large amount of blood is likely to be spilled through violence .
